Comments_List: I learned the grammar of Jewish Babylonian Aramaic, the reasons for various linguistic changes in the history of this dialect, and how it compares to other dialects of ancient Aramaic.
The main strength of this course is the focus upon modern linguistics in order to explain various phenomena exhibited in Babylonian Aramaic.
I would highly recommend this course both because of the usefulness of learning Babylonian Aramaic and in the general linguistic knowledge gained.
